subject: No more losing with this ...
body:
kiss not  shock but process it harbour
some blood but wood not grey or umbrella , watch
but society it second the metal see angry try band
try natural be picture and humour may solid in substance
or nose some rough in ball see parcel it's river
try scale try run it's 
seat may  organisation a leaf , tendency
see opposite it balance see selection it's cough a pain
! silk ! store on quick , feeble a waiting
some hanging in feather not bucket or iron it's black
but earth see tall the harmony some vessel some tired
on stem see violent may 
basket try  burn but kiss ! blade
it's error a humor ! process see political or loss
! laugh the dirty some decision but equal see star
in weather not damage it's system ! healthy on care
try gun in kettle or stitch be heart in dear
the general it organisation see
